plot: Closet is the story of Elliot, a young boy who is trying to deal with the monster that is hiding in his closet. Elliot's parents are in a tense relationship that makes dealing with his fears more real than he can accept.
title: Closet
plot_es: Closet is the story of Elliot, a young boy who is trying to deal with the monster that is hiding in his closet. Elliot's parents are in a tense relationship that makes dealing with his fears more real than he can accept.
